entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:32 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Rain showers beginning this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy later this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
